name: regimen
description: A simple, opinionated training regimen tracker

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w frontend" "npm run dev -w backend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend
scripts.test: npm run test -w backend && npm run test -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w backend && npm run clean -w frontend
